body:
Comment 1: 
This has the same issue, without using an Index expression:

package p
type mytype struct{f int}
func next() {
  var a [5]int
  if func()int{
   // This is also "between the keyword and the opening brace of the block", but doesn't require parens:
    b := a[0] == mytype{4}.f
    if b { return 3 }
    return 4
  }() == a[mytype{4}.f] {
  }
}
